title: Avicus Email Support Down?

replies.body:
If you haven't received a response within a week, then send another email.
If another week has gone by and you haven't received a response from your second email, contact the Sr.Staff directly.

So, two weeks, two emails.
If there's no response, contact the Sr.Staff via Skype.
